issue.title: [Go] Improve 'sum_float64_neon' performance
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15995](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15995). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Improve the Float64Funcs_Sum_1000000-64, get 19.7% performance uplift in cases which data set is larger than 1MB.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15995?focusedCommentId=17512763) by Matthew Topol (zeroshade):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12687
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12687>
